{{#eq vizTool "Plotly Dash"}}
**app/app.pyï¼ˆDashåº”ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼‰ï¼š**

```python
import dash
from dash import dcc, html, Input, Output
import plotly.express as px
import plotly.graph_objects as go
import pandas as pd
import dash_bootstrap_components as dbc

# åˆå§‹åŒ–åº”ç”¨
app = dash.Dash(__name__, external_stylesheets=[dbc.themes.BOOTSTRAP])

# åŠ è½½æ•°æ®
def load_data():
    df = pd.read_csv('data/processed/{{dataFile}}')
    return df

df = load_data()

# å¸ƒå±€
app.layout = dbc.Container([
    dbc.Row([
        dbc.Col(html.H1('{{dashboardName}}', className='text-center mb-4'), width=12)
    ]),
    
    # KPIå¡ç‰‡
    dbc.Row([
        dbc.Col([
            dbc.Card([
                dbc.CardBody([
                    html.H4('{{kpi1Name}}', className='card-title'),
                    html.H2(id='kpi-1', className='text-primary')
                ])
            ])
        ], width=3),
        dbc.Col([
            dbc.Card([
                dbc.CardBody([
                    html.H4('{{kpi2Name}}', className='card-title'),
                    html.H2(id='kpi-2', className='text-success')
                ])
            ])
        ], width=3),
        dbc.Col([
            dbc.Card([
                dbc.CardBody([
                    html.H4('{{kpi3Name}}', className='card-title'),
                    html.H2(id='kpi-3', className='text-warning')
                ])
            ])
        ], width=3),
        dbc.Col([
            dbc.Card([
                dbc.CardBody([
                    html.H4('{{kpi4Name}}', className='card-title'),
                    html.H2(id='kpi-4', className='text-info')
                ])
            ])
        ], width=3),
    ], className='mb-4'),
    
    # ç­›é€‰å™¨
    dbc.Row([
        dbc.Col([
            html.Label('æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´ï¼š'),
            dcc.DatePickerRange(
                id='date-range',
                start_date=df['date'].min(),
                end_date=df['date'].max(),
                display_format='YYYY-MM-DD'
            )
        ], width=4),
        dbc.Col([
            html.Label('ç±»åˆ«ç­›é€‰ï¼š'),
            dcc.Dropdown(
                id='category-filter',
                options=[{'label': cat, 'value': cat} for cat in df['{{categoryColumn}}'].unique()],
                multi=True,
                placeholder='é€‰æ‹©ç±»åˆ«'
            )
        ], width=4),
    ], className='mb-4'),
    
    # å›¾è¡¨åŒºåŸŸ
    dbc.Row([
        dbc.Col([
            dcc.Graph(id='time-series-chart')
        ], width=8),
        dbc.Col([
            dcc.Graph(id='pie-chart')
        ], width=4),
    ], className='mb-4'),
    
    dbc.Row([
        dbc.Col([
            dcc.Graph(id='bar-chart')
        ], width=6),
        dbc.Col([
            dcc.Graph(id='scatter-chart')
        ], width=6),
    ], className='mb-4'),
    
    # æ•°æ®è¡¨
    dbc.Row([
        dbc.Col([
            html.H4('è¯¦ç»†æ•°æ®', className='mb-3'),
            dcc.Graph(id='data-table')
        ], width=12)
    ]),
    
    # è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ·æ–°
    dcc.Interval(
        id='interval-component',
        interval={{refreshInterval}}*1000,  # æ¯«ç§’
        n_intervals=0
    )
], fluid=True)

# å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼šæ›´æ–°KPI
@app.callback(
    [Output('kpi-1', 'children'),
     Output('kpi-2', 'children'),
     Output('kpi-3', 'children'),
     Output('kpi-4', 'children')],
    [Input('date-range', 'start_date'),
     Input('date-range', 'end_date'),
     Input('category-filter', 'value')]
)
def update_kpis(start_date, end_date, categories):
    # ç­›é€‰æ•°æ®
    filtered_df = df[
        (df['date'] >= start_date) & 
        (df['date'] <= end_date)
    ]
    
    if categories:
        filtered_df = filtered_df[filtered_df['{{categoryColumn}}'].isin(categories)]
    
    # è®¡ç®—KPI
    kpi1 = f"{filtered_df['{{metric1}}'].sum():,.0f}"
    kpi2 = f"{filtered_df['{{metric2}}'].mean():.2f}"
    kpi3 = f"{len(filtered_df):,}"
    kpi4 = f"{filtered_df['{{metric3}}'].max():.1f}"
    
    return kpi1, kpi2, kpi3, kpi4

# å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼šæ—¶é—´åºåˆ—å›¾
@app.callback(
    Output('time-series-chart', 'figure'),
    [Input('date-range', 'start_date'),
     Input('date-range', 'end_date'),
     Input('category-filter', 'value')]
)
def update_time_series(start_date, end_date, categories):
    filtered_df = df[
        (df['date'] >= start_date) & 
        (df['date'] <= end_date)
    ]
    
    if categories:
        filtered_df = filtered_df[filtered_df['{{categoryColumn}}'].isin(categories)]
    
    fig = px.line(
        filtered_df.groupby('date')['{{metric1}}'].sum().reset_index(),
        x='date',
        y='{{metric1}}',
        title='{{metric1}}è¶‹åŠ¿'
    )
    
    fig.update_layout(
        hovermode='x unified',
        template='plotly_white'
    )
    
    return fig

# å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼šé¥¼å›¾
@app.callback(
    Output('pie-chart', 'figure'),
    [Input('date-range', 'start_date'),
     Input('date-range', 'end_date')]
)
def update_pie_chart(start_date, end_date):
    filtered_df = df[
        (df['date'] >= start_date) & 
        (df['date'] <= end_date)
    ]
    
    category_sum = filtered_df.groupby('{{categoryColumn}}')['{{metric1}}'].sum().reset_index()
    
    fig = px.pie(
        category_sum,
        values='{{metric1}}',
        names='{{categoryColumn}}',
        title='ç±»åˆ«åˆ†å¸ƒ'
    )
    
    return fig

# å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼šæŸ±çŠ¶å›¾
@app.callback(
    Output('bar-chart', 'figure'),
    [Input('category-filter', 'value')]
)
def update_bar_chart(categories):
    filtered_df = df.copy()
    
    if categories:
        filtered_df = filtered_df[filtered_df['{{categoryColumn}}'].isin(categories)]
    
    top_10 = filtered_df.nlargest(10, '{{metric1}}')
    
    fig = px.bar(
        top_10,
        x='{{nameColumn}}',
        y='{{metric1}}',
        title='Top 10 {{metric1}}',
        color='{{metric1}}',
        color_continuous_scale='Blues'
    )
    
    return fig

# å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼šæ•£ç‚¹å›¾
@app.callback(
    Output('scatter-chart', 'figure'),
    [Input('category-filter', 'value')]
)
def update_scatter(categories):
    filtered_df = df.copy()
    
    if categories:
        filtered_df = filtered_df[filtered_df['{{categoryColumn}}'].isin(categories)]
    
    fig = px.scatter(
        filtered_df,
        x='{{metric2}}',
        y='{{metric3}}',
        color='{{categoryColumn}}',
        size='{{metric1}}',
        title='{{metric2}} vs {{metric3}}',
        hover_data=['{{nameColumn}}']
    )
    
    return fig

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run_server(debug=True, port=8050)
```

{{#eq vizTool "Streamlit"}}
**streamlit_app.pyï¼ˆStreamlitåº”ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼‰ï¼š**

```python
import streamlit as st
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px
import plotly.graph_objects as go
from datetime import datetime, timedelta

# é¡µé¢é…ç½®
st.set_page_config(
    page_title='{{dashboardName}}',
    page_icon='ğŸ“Š',
    layout='wide'
)

# æ ‡é¢˜
st.title('{{dashboardName}}')

# åŠ è½½æ•°æ®
@st.cache_data
def load_data():
    df = pd.read_csv('data/processed/{{dataFile}}')
    df['date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['date'])
    return df

df = load_data()

# ä¾§è¾¹æ ç­›é€‰
st.sidebar.header('ç­›é€‰æ¡ä»¶')

date_range = st.sidebar.date_input(
    'æ—¥æœŸèŒƒå›´',
    value=(df['date'].min(), df['date'].max()),
    min_value=df['date'].min(),
    max_value=df['date'].max()
)

categories = st.sidebar.multiselect(
    'ç±»åˆ«',
    options=df['{{categoryColumn}}'].unique(),
    default=df['{{categoryColumn}}'].unique()
)

# ç­›é€‰æ•°æ®
filtered_df = df[
    (df['date'] >= pd.Timestamp(date_range[0])) &
    (df['date'] <= pd.Timestamp(date_range[1])) &
    (df['{{categoryColumn}}'].isin(categories))
]

# KPIæŒ‡æ ‡
col1, col2, col3, col4 = st.columns(4)

with col1:
    st.metric(
        label='{{kpi1Name}}',
        value=f"{filtered_df['{{metric1}}'].sum():,.0f}",
        delta=f"{((filtered_df['{{metric1}}'].sum() / df['{{metric1}}'].sum() - 1) * 100):.1f}%"
    )

with col2:
    st.metric(
        label='{{kpi2Name}}',
        value=f"{filtered_df['{{metric2}}'].mean():.2f}"
    )

with col3:
    st.metric(
        label='{{kpi3Name}}',
        value=f"{len(filtered_df):,}"
    )

with col4:
    st.metric(
        label='{{kpi4Name}}',
        value=f"{filtered_df['{{metric3}}'].max():.1f}"
    )

# å›¾è¡¨åŒºåŸŸ
st.markdown('---')

# æ—¶é—´åºåˆ—å›¾
st.subheader('è¶‹åŠ¿åˆ†æ')

time_series_df = filtered_df.groupby('date')['{{metric1}}'].sum().reset_index()

fig_time = px.line(
    time_series_df,
    x='date',
    y='{{metric1}}',
    title='{{metric1}}æ—¶é—´è¶‹åŠ¿'
)

st.plotly_chart(fig_time, use_container_width=True)

# ä¸¤åˆ—å¸ƒå±€
col1, col2 = st.columns(2)

with col1:
    st.subheader('ç±»åˆ«åˆ†å¸ƒ')
    
    category_df = filtered_df.groupby('{{categoryColumn}}')['{{metric1}}'].sum().reset_index()
    
    fig_pie = px.pie(
        category_df,
        values='{{metric1}}',
        names='{{categoryColumn}}'
    )
    
    st.plotly_chart(fig_pie, use_container_width=True)

with col2:
    st.subheader('Top 10 æ’å')
    
    top_10 = filtered_df.nlargest(10, '{{metric1}}')
    
    fig_bar = px.bar(
        top_10,
        x='{{nameColumn}}',
        y='{{metric1}}',
        color='{{metric1}}',
        color_continuous_scale='Blues'
    )
    
    st.plotly_chart(fig_bar, use_container_width=True)

# æ•£ç‚¹å›¾
st.subheader('ç›¸å…³æ€§åˆ†æ')

fig_scatter = px.scatter(
    filtered_df,
    x='{{metric2}}',
    y='{{metric3}}',
    color='{{categoryColumn}}',
    size='{{metric1}}',
    hover_data=['{{nameColumn}}']
)

st.plotly_chart(fig_scatter, use_container_width=True)

# æ•°æ®è¡¨
st.subheader('è¯¦ç»†æ•°æ®')

st.dataframe(
    filtered_df.sort_values('{{metric1}}', ascending=False).head(20),
    use_container_width=True
)

# ä¸‹è½½æŒ‰é’®
csv = filtered_df.to_csv(index=False).encode('utf-8')

st.download_button(
    label='ä¸‹è½½æ•°æ® (CSV)',
    data=csv,
    file_name='filtered_data.csv',
    mime='text/csv'
)
```
